description: If taking this dish on a picnic, mix the topping ingredients together and pack in a separate container from the baguette slices. Assemble when ready to eat.

default: ½ red pepper, rubbed with sea salt and olive oil
2 slices crusty white baguette, drizzled with olive oil and griddled

steps: Place the red pepper directly onto a gas flame and chargrill until black blisters form on all sides. Put into a plastic bag, seal well and leave for two minutes.
Remove the pepper from the bag, peel and slice. Put the red pepper slices onto the griddled bread, add the chopped anchovies, pine nuts and sesame seeds.
title: Roasted red pepper bruschetta
